alert.note: Alert for Henry; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 2:24PM CDT until May 07 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Weakley County in west Tennessee... Northwestern Henry County in west Tennessee... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 223 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sharon, or 7 miles southeast of Martin, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Martin, Paris, Dresden, Greenfield, Gleason, Sharon, Cottage Grove, Palmersville, Matheny Grove, Sandhill, Ore Springs, Jones Mill, Como, Ralston, Osage and Pisgah. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
